about_the_game:
Emily Rivers, a forensic investigator and medium, receives devastating news: her long-missing parents have been declared officially deceased. Returning to her inherited esoteric shop, Eternal Memories, Emily stumbles upon her mother's journal, detailing eerie events at the abandoned Starlight Dreams Hotel. Drawn by the mystery, Emily ventures into the hotel's haunted halls, encountering restless spirits, cryptic clues, and a malevolent entity known as the Lurker. Will she unravel the secrets of the 13th floor and the truth behind her family's disappearance, or will the echoes of the past consume her?

This Collector's Edition includes:

🕯️ Haunting Hidden-Object Scenes!

Enjoy richly detailed and atmospheric locations as you search to find hidden objects crucial to solving the mystery. Each scene is masterfully designed to enhance the eerie, supernatural theme of the Starlight Dreams Hotel!

🕯️ Intricate Puzzles & Mini-Games!

Test your forensic investigator skills with a diverse array of challenging puzzles, including logic riddles, matching games, and creative ciphers. Relax with soothing mini-games that provide a respite from the tension-filled journey!

🕯️ Supernatural Collectibles & Achievements!

Explore every corner of the haunted hotel to uncover hidden collectibles such as spectral artifacts, journal entries, and mysterious trinkets. Earn exclusive achievements as a testament to your skill and thoroughness in navigating this otherworldly adventure!

🕯️ Shape Your Own Destiny!

Every decision you make impacts Emily’s journey, leading to different story outcomes. Will she uncover the truth about her family’s disappearance, or will she fall prey to the Lurker’s dark influence? Replayability ensures you can explore every possible path!
